title: Enable Relative Uri with WebBrowserTask for files stored in IsolatedStorage
body: Doing something like the actual WebBrowserTask, but with Uri pointing to file in IsolatedStorage

comments.body: But WebBrowserTask should allow to pass custom headers... So that it can skip the login page and directly show the actual content. Isn't it?
This isn't possible given WP's security model. The WebBrowserTask launches the Web Browser application, which doesn't have access to your application's Isolated Storage.
